title: Signifcant FPS issue since patch??
body: Since the last patch has anyone been experiencing a lag sorta feeling like my ping will be fine but everyone stops moving and then when they move the ping is still the same like, I never lag really and since patch this happens in 90% of my games, help if someone knows pls

replies.body:
It sounds more like you're having what's known as packet loss, rather than an FPS issue. If your FPS stays the same, that's a good indicator. 

Packet loss is a type of connection issue where you remain "connected" to the internet, but your connection is unstable because you are losing packets of data. This is most commonly presented as the "everything stops then suddenly catches up" feeling you get.

Try unplugging and rebooting your modem and router. Unplug them for about a minute before you plug them back in. Also take a look at the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) page here.

Elduris with the assist! {{summoner:31}} 

This hits the nail on the head pretty much, but we can take this a step further to confirm whether or not you're having packet loss. Grab some of the game logs that gave you problems, and toss them into our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to see if our packet loss suspicions are correct.
